fields.name: Chained Reaction (C1)
fields.value: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon a spark that bombards enemies, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.

fields.name: Explosive Frags (C2)
fields.value: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases enemy DEF by 23% for 10s.

fields.name: Exquisite Compound (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Sparkly Explosion (C4)
fields.value: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

fields.name: Nova Burst (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Blazing Delight (C6)
fields.value:
While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, other members of the party will continuously regenerate Energy.
When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.
